product.created: A new Product is created with identifier {{ param }}
product.updated: A Product is updated with identifier {{ param }}
product.deleted: A Product is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Product {{ id }}?

placeholder.title: e.g. product name, brand, colour, size

tooltip.title: Any information about brand, colour, or size of the product should be added to the title separated by comma.
tooltip.image: Images must be smaller 1MB. Please make sure that you own the right to use the selected images.
tooltip.alt-text: Give a brief description of the image. This is important as the text (1) displayed if the image is not loaded, (2) is relevant to partially sighted visitors to get an idea of what is displayed, (3) will be considered by search engines

product.secondpanel: Set the price of your Product
product.thirdpanel: Select applicable shipping option for your Product
product.title: Title*
